full_summary:
=====================================

<Title in English and French>
---------------------------

ACAN - Investigating, Evaluating, and Developing Methods of Verification for CSA F280-12
PCAN - Enquête, Évaluation et Élaboration de Méthodes de Vérification pour la Norme CSA F280-12

<Government Contract Details>
-----------------------------

* **Reference Number**: WS3910205373-Doc3910240021
* **Amendment Number**: 1
* **Solicitation Number**: WS3910205373
* **Publication Date**: 2023-03-09
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-03-29T14:00:00
* **Amendment Date**: 2023-03-09

<Government Contract Information>
---------------------------------

* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **End User**: Department of Natural Resources (NRCan)
* **Notice URL**: <http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15647746?extsite=MTU2NDc3NDZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==> [French](<http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15647746?extsite=MTU2NDc3NDZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==>)

<Government Contract Description>
---------------------------------

The Department of Natural Resources (NRCan) is seeking a coordinated effort from experienced Residential HVAC Designers to develop, test, and assess an industry model for testing software against CSA F280-12, as well as a verification model for municipalities to adopt better equipment sizing practices. The contract will be for a period of 2 years from Contract Award, and the closing date for the proposal submission was March 29, 2023.

<Tender Notice Contact Details>
--------------------------------

* **Contact Name**: Monfette, Annick (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Contact Email**: annick.monfette@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Contact Phone**: None
* **Contact Fax**: None
* **Trade Agreements**: Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), and Canada-Honduras Free Trade
